page_des: The AzzaFortysix Mod Launcher allows you to install mods for a whole range of different games. The mod launcher can be downloaded for free from this website.
home_incorrect_rank: This is the initial version, please reach out to us on Discord if your rank is being detected incorrectly.
mod_launcher_intro: The mod launcher is <0>100% free</0> and can be <1>downloaded here</1>. You can browse the games and mods that are available <2>here</2>.
patreon_ad: You can become a <0>Patron</0> to unlock mods upto 2 weeks earlier than the public release. We will try to release the majority of mods to the public. Currently mods that take a significant amount of time or effort will be reserved exclusively for <0>Patrons</0>.
please_login_ad: Please login to access <0>Patron</0> only features such as linking your Patreon account to your mod launcher which will unlock exclusive mods and give you early access to other mods.
